title: What should I do with this?
body:
I played a normal game today, our jungle lee did not bring smite, then come to my mid lane, feed and take my farm. I blame him then he reports me for toxic? This lee is trolling and being toxic to me as well, but our teammate duo with him so they all report me then I got banned, my honour level dropped to lv 0. 
What should I do with this case?? My jungle is trolling and taking my farm, I can not blame, I can not afk, and I got banned because they are duo??
Is this how you treat the solo player?? Don't you think the lee has to banned as well?

Being a jungle don't bring smite, toxic to mid lane player, taking mid lane's farm, and rage quit for the last 10 mins(we could win but he rages quit).

I request Riot stuff to recheck this case, go check the chat log and replay, don't just ban me because they were a group player. Be fair, okay??

replies.body: This game taught us don't play alone and we should suffer other's faults? funny
Should have just played along with him. He has a hard time because he forgot smite. The least you could have done was use the time to roam to get your other players ahead.
He forgot the smite for sure but taking my farm without saying anything? And how about he rages quit for the last half-game when we had a chance to win the game?
Might sound clachied, but did you try talking to him at all? Sometimes some positive reinforcement actually does work. it is not just a meme

If someone is abusing you with texts and pings and behaviours in the game, how could you talk positively to him?
All I wish is Riot could handle this case fairly, I don't know why he did not get banned yet. I reported him after the game.

Well, what I do, if I want to win and am not just enjoying the show, is take a deep breath to calm myself and then try to talk things out. Look at the map, tell the guy where he can go to get some EXP or farm or to help out.
It's too late to talk about this. The fact is, I got banned by blaming him, and he is still playing. Shouldn't he get any punished by abusing me and afk the game because he gets mad?
maybe that is just your perspective of it. Maybe he went AFK because he got sick of no one helping him and maybe he wasn't abusing you, but just trying to help/stay in the game.

Riot won't do it because it flies in the face of their beliefs, but they should just remove the report function. The game would be a better place without it. There would be no cases of report abuse anymore, and there will never be an end to toxic players anyway.

It sounds like you didn't have a normal JG, and you just expected him to JG normally ... in normals. Perhaps reasonably so, but that doesn't matter.

Also, bots have no care for context, and the white knights here will tell you if you said something bad in chat then you deserve whatever punishment the bot deems appropriate. My opinion otherwise doesn't matter also.
